Jayanth Prathipati
About Blog

Jayanth Prathipati

Student, Mobile Developer, UX Researcher

I am a Computer Science senior at Virginia Tech with a heavy focus on HCI. I work at the Usability Lab at Virginia Tech doing research on personal and health informatics. I'm also a software engineer at Element 84 and I'm the creator of Jhana and Compost for Instapaper. When I'm not working, I like to take photographs, hike, and write about UX on my blog.

Check out my projects!
